document_data.mainbody:
Rizzeryl was a drow wizard in Undermountain in the early 1490s DR.
Rizzeryl led a hidden base inside the Arcane Chambers managed by eight Zhent wererats.
In 1492 DR, some wererat minions of Rizzeryl stole a key from the southern watch post of the Xanathars Thieves Guild on the level. Rizzeryl falsely believed it opened a Melairkyn vault. The Xanathar lieutenant Shunn Shurreth wanted to kidnap and ransom a wererat to get the key back.
Rizzeryl liked to remain invisible when dealing with outsiders. As a Zhent ally, he wanted to destroy the Xanathars influence in the Arcane Chambers.
Rizzeryl worked for two masters on the surface, he was an ally of the Zhentarim but secretly he worked for the drow House Auvryndar. He had a quasit familiar and had good dealings with the leader of the Zhent wererats.
